extendedInfo.description: The new game from the creators of Logo Quiz for Android."Logo Quiz: Flags Edition" is a quiz game where you have to guess the flags of different countries. Throughout the game you'll be presented with a bunch of different levels, each containing flags of different countries.More than 200 flags in the game!Don't worry if you're stuck on the flag âÂ you can always get some clue by using hints (Each flag logo has 3 of them), or ask your friends on facebook or twitter.Game features:â¢ More than 200 flag logos of different countriesâ¢ For every flag in the quiz, there are 3 hints that help youâ¢ Reveal the full logo once it's guessedâ¢ Ask your friends on facebook or twitter to help you complete the quizâ¢ Many hours of fun gameplay ... That's Logo Quiz: Flags EditionLike us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/LogoQuizAppFollow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/EmergingGames

reviews.title: Great fun:-)
reviews.comment: A good way to test your geography and while away spare few minutes.... I did get some guesses correct as well!
reviews.author: Anne Byrne

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Such an easy and great game. Finished it quickly. Need more levels! Though getting hints is hard and I wish you could see the whole flag instead of just a part of it - would make is easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Only thing it\'s missing is optional landscape orientation... Otherwise it is pretty awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice..
reviews.comment: The game is nice but. The icons are too small to know
reviews.author: Ahmed Saifi

reviews.title: Logo quiz: flags edition
reviews.comment: Very good but the space where the flags are displayed could be bigger cause it will make the guessing slightly easier. Overall its exellent!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate it.
reviews.comment: Typing out country names sucks and the button placement so close to the ads sucks worse
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Logo quiz flags edition
reviews.comment: Really fun and brain exercizing game and also good for all the family
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flag quiz
reviews.comment: Get\'s tough towards the end, it\'s taken me ages to finish.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Not the best... Cant use the hint because it doesnt show anything update or un instal.
reviews.author: Corey Joned

reviews.title: Nice idea but poorly done
reviews.comment: Showing all flags as circles instead of rectangles (how are we going to distinguish Monaco from Indonesia then?) Having to type all country names manually (thus having to deal with typos etc) instead of selecting it from a list. Ambiguous country names: \"Holland\" instead of the Netherlands, really? Holland is actually two provinces within the Netherlands, you know. And \"Europe\" instead of \"European Union\"? It\'s really something different.  So altogether, I say: poorly done.
reviews.author: Rogier E

reviews.title: Nice fun relaxing game
reviews.comment: A nice game that makes you learn about countries flags and waste some time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: This is a great game but I can\'t use the hints I earn so I am struggling please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not great on my phone
reviews.comment: OK but a few lettersdon\'t work especilly P in my case and if you put on the wrong letter by mistake and go to delete then you have to press the button quite a few times :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome, but annoying
reviews.comment: I really like this quiz, but I don\'t like the fact the flags have been cropped to fit in the circle. Other than that, though, a great quiz. 9/10 definately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great for general knowledge.
reviews.comment: Wonderful game for trivial general knowledge however the game constantly promotes their line before you can continue.   This with many other ads the game loses its integrity and I gave this 3 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: libra n jawward always
reviews.comment: l love this app very educational love u jawward libra will always hold u down
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not well thought out
reviews.comment: The usage of circles was a bad decision. Many cases of missing important parts of the flag because it had to fit in the circle. Plus the shape of the flag can be useful in identification.  Also not recognizing common abbreviations is a mistake as well. Overall, not as good as their logo quiz.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Not only is this app fun, it provides a very good learning expeirence. If i had the option i would give this app 20 stars!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: No 100% non-hint way of getting Monaco/Indonesia correct. Just to be picky. But seriously, crappy keyboard and failure to recognise common abbreviations
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: This game is sorta hard, seeing that I don\'t know my country flags too well!
reviews.author: Timothy Anger
